title: Bot lane when you have a great support

replies.body: As a support main I approve
im a support main and i approve as well
Support mains unite!

Did you say... support mains?

{{champion:53}} [Mastery Ranks]

He's the best support i mean

I'm pretty sure everyone here was implying that they were a blitzcrank main
I'm a support main because I don't like Blitzcrank, so I play a champion that can make his life hell.
You talking about this gal{{champion:25}} ?
Nothing like a Nami for your ADC to munch on.

http://danbooru.donmai.us/data/dd6109ebc850da0d95d32a3859f1206d.jpg 

??
This to me is verging dangerously into vore territory.  And i really do not want to see that here, well, to be frank i don't want to see it anywhere, but the interwebz be a dangerous place.

Tell me about it. It's like swimming along happily down the bot lane, like in a very own, personal pond of tranquility, giving a bubble of love here, a splash of heal there...
But suddenly there is a storm coming, and a spectacular flopping. Or even worse, a terrible nightmare! Why, one never know where one might end up.

The above illustration is a warning to all Nami players to beware of the
 {{champion:412}}

One wouldn't want to become the very thing that the opposing ADC could munch on. It's a sad story, really. :(
 {{item:3070}} 

_I should know, I am a support main myself. And Nami is my primary fish of choice._
Thresh pisses me off more when i play Leona.  Fuck Flay.

Amen to that! I just keep him banned if I can, to avoid that problem all together.
I bet his entire kit is deliberately made to piss off the opposition. >-<
And what about me, then, Mhihnj, as the opposing sushi? Why you think I prefer him banned? ^^
lol i play thresh. Very safe pick imo
No, I'm a Leona main. Almost as bad for him as grabbing an Amumu.
hell yea, how to burst an adc before the supp react ? Leona.

good blitz will pull when you engage. nope 

leona can be pulled mid dash

I used to run Leona into him. A lot of ADC's don't know when to follow up though.
I find {{champion:420}} to be much more interesting. I may not chain-stun their ADC. But if ult is off CD, my ADC is going to enjoy some free farm. One way or another.

Also, I have developed an unhealthy addiction to watching bot bot laners dance around tentacles all phase. I should probably get some help. (>_>)

I also don't like Blitzcrank. I find at my lower elo anyone i see playing blitz isn't a real supp main. They are just a blitz main and blitz happens to be a supp. I literally have almost all champs and have yet to pick up blitz and have only playing him about 4-5 times during free weeks.
For me its all about {{champion:432}} , followed by {{champion:267}} and {{champion:412}}

Sorry, but when I read "Blitz" and "Thresh" in the same post (as we all know, the 3rd tenant of Hook City, Nautilus, is never present together with the other two, so we'll gloss over him), I had to post this:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6Tjw3uh1qks
lol thanks for this, enjoyed it immensely.

Where is the rabadons?
The ludens?
The mejais?

I am support main, and I have played blitz a lot. I am glad I have played him a lot. I really have a good grasp how to defeat him, he is only good if the person can position to grab, that is rather simple to defeat though. Thresh really is the same in terms of defeating. But I tend to do well when I play him, hardly do anymore though.
Support main. 5th Mastery {{champion:89}} {{champion:16}} . 4th {{champion:53}} . and 3rd on many others. So ya that happens all the time

The anime is called Magi, Its a pretty good watch if you have the time.

damn, though it might have been something else cus the pic is so small on my phone.  

I've already watched that all. many times...
{{champion:35}} {{champion:17}} am I doing it right?
There is no other way to do it
There was actually a time I was yelling at my support for getting me kills, because I could not farm anything and had to back after each double kill

i main alistar....i love seeing a blitz.....because he helps me engage on his adc :)  so helpful much support


   my next favorite is thunderlords leona.....its like ordering pizza for my adc
But my silver 5 adc wont open his mouth
Bard is lyfe

Then, I am Support {{champion:201}}.
